setup_momo.phone_note: Your number will also be used if you forget your password and for important account messages. SMS fees may apply.
setup_momo.terms_text: By checking the box below, you agree to the <termsLink>Terms of Use</termsLink>, <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink> and confirm you are over 18 years old. Netflix will automatically continue your plan and charge ({{price}}₫/month) until you cancel.

setup_credit.international_payment_notice: Your payment will be processed internationally. Additional bank fees may apply.
setup_credit.terms_text: By checking the box below, you agree to the <termsLink>Terms of Use</termsLink>, <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink> and confirm you are over 18 years old. Netflix will automatically continue your membership and charge your payment method (currently {{price}}₫/month) until you cancel. You can cancel anytime to avoid future charges.
setup_credit.redirect_note: You will be redirected to Credit to complete your payment.

q1.title: What is Netflix?
q1.description: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. Watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single commercial – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

q2.title: How much does Netflix cost?
q2.description: Plans range from $6.99 to $19.99 per month. No extra costs, no contracts.

q3.title: Where can I watch?
q3.description: Watch instantly on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix app, or stream from your laptop, tablet, or phone.

q4.title: How do I cancel?
q4.description: Netflix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in just two clicks.

q5.title: What can I watch on Netflix?
q5.description: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more.

q6.title: Is Netflix good for kids?
q6.description: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space.

reasons.title: More reasons to join
reasons.watchOnTvDesc: Watch on Smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players, and more.
reasons.downloadShowsDesc: Save your favorites and always have something to watch.
reasons.watchEverywhereDesc: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV.
reasons.createProfilesDesc: Send kids on adventures with their favorite characters in a space made just for them — free with your membership.

step.password: Step 1: Enter your password to continue

step.paymentDescription: Your payment is encrypted and you can change it anytime.
